author: timneutkens
message:
Turbopack Build: Fix edge-config-validation test (#80847)

## What?

This test is correct but in Turbopack we correctly leave out `/` since
middleware is not a route by itself.

files.patch:

   },
   "test/production/edge-config-validations/index.test.ts": {
-    "passed": [],
-    "failed": [
+    "passed": [
       "Edge config validations fails to build when unstable_allowDynamic is not a string"
     ],
+    "failed": [],
     "pending": [],
     "flakey": [],
     "runtimeError": false
